HIRO
  • Docs »
  • Introduction

Introduction¶

HIRO is an extendable library for rapid application development and visualization of data. It automatically manages configurable window and it’s GUI, provides user controls for 3D manipulation and visualization. Using HIRO for your applications fastens up workflow and allows you to visualize data from your program easily.

To report any issues with library use issue tracking on GitLab.

License¶

You can use HIRO library for educational and research purpouses free of charge. For commercial use, contact us at skeletex@skeletex.xyz.

Disclaimer¶

Builded pack of libraries contains also third party libraries to make integration to your project more straightforward. Note, that these libraries are not licensed the same way as HIRO. See web pages of individual libraries for more info.
